text: His office is clean makes you feel comfortable. Dr. Johannson and his staff are really nice. Easy to talk to.

name: Amanda Brown
text: He is the best Dr . Around !! He has delivered 2 of my babies and he helped me get my diabetes under control !! My family loves Dr J very much !!🤍🖤

name: Juliana Turner
text: Dr. J is the best OBGYN I’ve ever been to. He’s very relaxed and talks to you before just jumping in. All procedures are super gentle and never painful.

name: Candace Davis
text: Dr J and staff provide excellent care. He is sincere when working toward solutions for your best health. His staff is kind and considerate as well.

name: Reagan Merrell
text: Dr. Johannson was amazing. He got me in quickly and made sure I received the care I needed. We love him and plan to continue using him!

name: Ceola Harris
text: They were very nice and respectable and I like them I would recommend anybody to go to him he is so nice and so are the ladies that work there

name: Sonya Golden
text: Dr Johansson was very refreshing, had a great bedside manner and put me at ease. I definitely recommend him.

name: sharon Roberson
text: I really loved the staff and Doctor both they were all very friendly and answered all of my questions and concerns.❤️❤️❤️ I really love it here

name: Alysia Gooden
text: Dr. Johansson and staff provide exceptional care to their patients in a friendly, professional environment!

name: Mary Cobb
text:
I love the staff at Dr. J’s office. I have delivered 2 of my 3 kids with this office and have my yearly check ups. The entire staff is kind and friendly when you walk in the door or call on the phone. The office is welcoming and comfortable even with all the changes due to Covid.

Dr. J’s approach to feminine reproductive care is refreshing and forward thinking. I cannot thank them enough for welcoming me into their care and giving me the, sometimes hard to swallow, reality of what I need to do to improve my health. Without the support of this staff, I would have had repeat c sections. Thanks to his advice of hiring a doula and following his diet suggestions, I was able to deliver my next 2 kids VBAC without any interventions. I dearly love this practice and the staff. I will gladly continue my health care here.

name: Hope Brown
text: Dr. J and his staff are amazing! Every visit I’ve felt comfortable and well-informed about my healthcare. I definitely recommend Cheaha Women’s Health & Wellness for those needing gynecological or obstetrician care.

name: Judy Skinner
text: Dr. Johannson and his staff are wonderful.  I'm thankful to have found someone so caring.

name: Tierra Herron
text: The most friendliest and professional doctor and staff. Highly recommend for all your OB/GYN needs!

name: The Odyssey of Lulu
text: I loved how comfortable that ,Tiana and Dr. Johanson, made me feel! His office doesn't feel like the typical atmosphere for an obgyn, I loved this. Usually, I'm a nervous wreck when I go to this type of physician!

name: Loren Beckett
text: Always friendly and professional!

name: Jenny Jimenez
text: Dr Johansson was super personable. He was very friendly and professional. He made me feel very comfortable. His office staff were friendly as well. I took one star off only because I arrived 30 min early (as instructed) and I didn’t get put into a room until an hr after my appt time. Overall I’d go back for Dr Johansson but I’d make sure not to plan any other appointments/plans for a few hrs lol

name: Mollie Leggitt
text: He took the time to actually listen to me and seems to genuinely care for each of his patients and their well-being.

name: Purple Cinnamon
text: Quick sign in, very friendly staff, and Dr. Johannson is very personable and accommodating.

name: Erika Turner
text: Dr. Johannson and staff are friendly and incredibly thorough.

name: Hali Brock
text: 10/10 recommend Dr. Johannson for all obstetric and gynecological needs!

name: Anna Marble
text: Dr J is the best OB I could have ever hoped for! From helping me get pregnant to delivering my first baby in October 2019 he has been a genuine and sincere obstetrician. I feel like he absolutely cares about every patient of his on a different level from other OBGYNs I’ve been to. He cares about the moms, the babies, the birth plans. He’s respectful of yours wants and needs and always has time for the silly questions.

name: Shelby Epperson
text: Hands down the best OBGYN!

name: lyndsey birchfield
text: He is wonderful! Shelby is awful and rude! I will be finding another dr

resp.text: We are so sorry to see you go and that you had a poor interaction with our billing manager.

name: Annie Brunson
text: Great caring doc!

name: Rebekah Lucatorta
text: Dr. Johannson has been AMAZING!!! He has delivered 3 of my children! Every experience with him and all his staff has always been a positive one! I couldn't recommend a better doctor!

resp.text: It was my privilege!

name: Ashley Cochran
text: Dr. J is the BEST! You want a doctor that actually cares? This is the place for you! The staff is phenomenal, too! LOVE CWH&W!❤️

name: Meranda Segrest
text: The absolute best!!

name: Amanda Owens
text: Amazing Doctor and staff

name: Jakea Player
text:
Dr. J and his staff exceeded my expectations. Dr. J is compassionate and real. He makes things easy to understand. Also, he takes his patient’s health VERY serious and every question is important to him. Dr. J’s personality sets him a part from other doctor’s. You can definitely tell that Dr. J is pursuing what he is called to do!

All of the ladies at Dr. J’s office always take such good care of me!

I am forever grateful!

name: Karlatyn O'Neal
text: Dr. Johannson is a phenomenal doctor. His staff is very friendly & professional. I always feel comfortable when I’m there. His staff will take very good care of you. Dr.Johannson is the reason I breastfed my second daughter. I’m so thankful for him. My doctor 👨‍⚕️ is the best!☺️

name: Alicia Miller
text: Amazing Dr. and staff! Wish I had known him when I was having my children but blessed to have met them regardless ❤

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Morgan Kilgo
text: Dr. J is not committed to patient care above himself... you might think he is a good Dr. but you better hope and pray that you don't go into labor on a holiday or when he is too busy to come in... because he will not drop anything to come to your aid or the aid of your unborn child and you will both suffer.  My nephew has several life long conditions resulting from a brain injury from being left in the birth canal while having late d cells for hours... it was Thanksgiving and Dr. J couldn't be bothered to come in. When he did arrive he had to rush the mother for an emergency C-section but the damage was already done. Beware of the wolf in sheep's clothing!

name: Mai Cheek
text: Dr. J was so great with me. My whole pregnancy was easy except towards the end when i had pre eclampsia and had to have emergency CS because my baby was in distress. I vaguely remember everything that went on that day but he explained my situation and what’s happening and so forth. At my post op care i had complications and was bleeding alot nonstop. I’m sure the nurses that was taking care of me are excellent at their job but i kinda wished Dr. J was there and overseeing everything and not just calling him on the phone because my bleeding hasn’t stop. Anyway he came over the next day even tho it was a holiday to check on me. If I were to have another baby, I’d probably still hire him. Thank you Dr. J, we are grateful for all that you’ve done for me and my lo.

name: Becca Jemison
text:
Dr. Johannson is a wonderful person and a credit to his field. I couldn't ask for better care from an OB. He is respectful and understanding of the natural process of labor. He is ready to listen and inform without making requirements or forcing his view on his patients. He is patient and easy going. His love for children is so wonderful and my whole family feels cared for when we visit his office.

I drove 2.5 hours for every appointment for my third pregnancy because I wanted to have a vaginal birth after two cesarean sections for my health and the health of my baby and no OB in my city was willing to allow me to. I had a wonderful, calming birth with Dr. Johannson when I was 41+3 weeks pregnant. I never felt pressured or worried, only supported. I am now pregnant with my fourth child and will continue to see Dr. Johannson because I know the only hard part of having a baby under his care will be the drive. I don't have any concerns about any of the rest of my pregnancy or delivery because I know he will support me and my wishes, while watching out for my health and the health of my baby.

name: Jennifer Payne
text: Dr.  J and his staff are awesome! He's caring and kind.   He listens to what you want and does his best to honor your wishes! He is an IBCLC and when your baby comes,  he's still there helping you and your little one on your breastfeeding journey! Love,  love,  love Dr. J!

name: Brittany Brooks
text: I can’t say enough about Dr Johannson and his staff. They’re the most uplifting, yet down to earth caregivers I’ve yet encountered. I have had a difficult time with my most recent pregnancy, and where anyone else would have become exasperated with me, Dr J has remained positive and encouraging. Very capable doctors, nurses, and secretaries. High praise for their organization and top notch care!!

name: Sharon Hall
text: Dr. J delivered my third son just hours after his wife had their own baby. He had no sleep and a new baby but nonetheless, he stayed by my side showing me more compassion, care and concern than I have ever experienced with a physician. More than I ever could have expected. He is a wonderful doctor and his staff is just as great.

name: Madison Alana
text: Very friendly staff! I had an excellent experience, and everything was kept professional. All of my questions, concerns, and opinions were listened to and taken into consideration. The environment was completely neat and clean. I have actually recommended this to a close friend, and she now uses this doctor.

name: Emily Sparks
text: We love Dr. Johannson! Incredibly thankful to have him graciously walk through a difficult pregnancy and delivery with us. He is very capable, willing to answer any questions, genuine, kind, and a calming presence. I could not imagine going through what we did with any other doctor.

name: Autumn Kirchner
text: Dr. Johannson and his staff are incredibly caring and a joy to be around. I felt valued and was well taken care of. Dr. Johannson always answered my questions with evidence of best practices and was always open to taking time to explain the positives and negatives to decisions. I am so thankful for this office and the birth I had with them. It was a true gift.

name: Jenny m
text: Dr. J goes over and beyond to help you through the most amazing blessing God gives you. He creates a sense of family instead of just another patient. As a first time mom, my husband and I had so many questions concerns and he explained everything in detail. His staff is wonderful. They are so encouraging and supportive! I couldn’t imagine going through this using any other provider! I can’t say enough great things about all of them!

name: Allison Stone
text: Dr. Johannson has really made an impression on myself and my husband. My husband tends to dislike any doctor but says nothing but good things about Dr. J. At my last appointment Dr. J had to leave for an emergency but said he would make sure to see me that day even though I was the last appointment of the day and they would be closed by the time he got back. I was very impressed that he took the time to see me even though it was a simple follow up and he could have easily had me reschedule. Conversation is easy and even though my first appointment with him was to confirm an early miscarriage we still managed to have a few laughs.

name: Ashley Vaughan
text: Dr. Johannson is one of the best doctors I have ever had! He takes the time to listen and explains plans of action extremely thoroughly, never making me feel uncomfortable or rushed. His staff has been very warm and welcoming as well. I highly recommend this office.

name: Tiesha Wilson
text: Dr. Johannson is the absolute best! He’s very patient and really cares for his patients. He’s been wonderful my entire pregnancy and even now that I’m 3 weeks pp.

name: Ruth Downey
text: Dr. Johannson is an amazing doctor and provided me with exceptional care during my pregnancy, labor, and delivery! Dr. Johannson and his staff at Cheaha Women's Health and Wellness make you feel comfortable and at ease. At every appointment, I felt like I was the only patient in the office! Dr. Johannson took time to speak to every concern and answer all of my questions. His compassion and care combined with his outstanding skill set and competent professionalism set him apart as a truly great physician. I cannot say enough positive words about my experience! I would highly recommend him! He is a blessing to our community, and it is obvious that he views his work as a calling to serve his patients.

name: Casey Lail
text: I can't say how much I love Dr. Johannson. He's amazing and doesn't rush your appointments. During my pregnancy he was so amazing, he respected my wishes and gave me the best possible care and checked up on us frequently. If we ever had another baby I'd choose him over ANY Dr hands down. It helps he's also an IBCLC and he has helped me through many many ups and downs nursing babies. He's calm and has the best bedside manner of any Dr around. I now see him for routine things and even still if I need to talk to him about things he's there and doesn't rush. You can tell he truly cares for all his patients. There's no Dr out there like him and we are forever thankful for him and love him. He will never know how thankful I am to him for the pregnancy and birth he gave me with our son.

name: Susan Armstrong
text: I have always received excellent care at Cheaha Women's Health and Wellness! Everyone there is so helpful and friendly, and Dr. Johannson takes the time to address all of your concerns. You can tell by the way he cares for his patients and babies that he loves what he does. I never felt pressured into making any decisions regarding my pregnancy or delivery. I was also able to get the help I needed  with breastfeeding from the lactation consultant at the office.

name: Christina T
text: My first visit went smoothly.  Waiting time wasn't even very long. Waiting room was comfortable and the staff was very friendly and professional. Dr was patient and efficient. Answered all my questions without making me feel uncomfortable and he explained everything in a way that I could understand. Love that they also call to remind you for appts as well. Def recommend.

name: Natasha Day
text: Dr. Johansson is amazing! I’ve never felt more comfortable with a Dr. during my pregnancy.

name: Nicole McClendon
text: I am really happy that I selected Dr.Johannson as my OBGYN. His staff truly makes you feel like part of the family and the atmosphere is always cool and calm. He really takes the time to get to know you and all your medical concerns and needs. My recent pregnancy was one of the hardest things I've ever had to experience. I was extremely sick throughout my entire pregnancy. Dr.Johannson and his staff made me feel as if I was a priority and they did everything to ensure I had a healthy delivery. I will forever sing his praises and would recommend his services to everyone I meet! I am forever grateful!

name: Kathleen Reaves
text: The doctor was knowledgeable of my health history.  He performed a thorough annual exam after asking questions and providing answers to specific inquiries.  The staff was thoughtful and helpful during the appointment.

name: Victoria Andino
text: Absolutely phenomenal doctor and staff, they make you feel welcome and at home. He's never made me feel like any of my questions were dumb and always takes extra time to explain everything so that I understand completely. My pregnancy, lactation and postnatal care were all great experiences. I highly recommend him!

name: Letisha Antone
text: Dr. Johannson has consistently gone above and beyond for me as his patient. Both of my sons were VBAC babies, born with his support and buy in on how I my labor and delivery to go. He is patient, he listens, and he genuinely cares. I cannot say enough good things about what an amazing care giver he is.

name: Gregory Tankersley
text: Dr. Johansson is the most caring, compassionate doctor I’ve ever been to. He is not rushing to get out of the room and he genuinely listens to you. I don’t feel like a patient at his office, I feel like family!

name: Amy Steen-Hurst
text: Dr. Johannson is very knowledgeable, patient, and up-to-date on the latest and medical expertise. He is all about making the experience the best it can be for each individual patient. He also has a very friendly and kind staff.

name: Avery
text: Dr. Johannson is the best OBGYN I have ever visited. He takes the time to listen to your concerns, answer any questions, and gives you straight, easy to understand answers. He also makes every effort to give you the birthing experience you want. You don’t have to worry about going into labor and having a doctor you never met delivering your baby...Dr. Johansson personally checked on me throughout my labor and delivered my baby. Not only is Dr. Johannson awesome, his staff is friendly, prompt, and knowledgeable. I will NEVER go anywhere else as long as he is around!!!

name: Bridgette Collier
text: I love Dr. J and his staff! He was supportive of my natural, low intervention, hospital birth plan with both my babies! Highly recommend!

name: Tiffany Torres
text: Dr. J always has such an awesome bedside manner. He treats all of his patients with respect. I’m thankful to have him as a doctor and don’t mind the long drive I have just to go see him.

name: Emily Haynes
text: I first started seeing Dr. J when he was at Ft. McClellan. He was exceptional! He was one of the only doctors that figured out my condition and helped me through it. Fast forward two years to my first pregnancy. He didn't take me seriously and treated me like I wasn't important. During my c-section, he talked about his breakfast he was going to have as soon as he could get finished. My birth experience was something I wouldn't wish on even my worst enemy, and I will never be back.

name: Alecia (Alecia Brooke S) Stovall
text: I have seen Dr. Johannson for prenatal care, breastfeeding visits, and annuals. He has always taken my concerns seriously and has always made me feel comfortable. My birthing experience was amazing thanks to Dr. J. I could not ask for a better doctor, and I recommend him to everyone, for OB care and GYN issues!

name: Erica Ervin
text: Dr. J and his staff are awesome. I so wish that he would've been my OB for my first birth as well. This experience was everything that I planned for it to be. I always experienced kindess, patience, and understanding throughout my whole prenatal period. And being the only provider in this area that encourages water labor put Cheaha Women's that much further ahead for me. I have nothing but great things to say about them.

name: Daisy Lizeth Luna
text: Dr. J is such a great doctor! He is great at what he does and he truly cares and listens. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Courtney Green
text: Down right the best doctor I have ever been too. He was the only doctor willing to help me go through with a vbac and breastfeeding help. It was absolutely an amazing experience and if I ever have another child again I am switching my insurance back to Alabama even though I'm in Georgia now and going to him. Idc if it's an hour and a half. He was amazing. Coaching me through my last half of pushing and making sure that I stayed calm. The best experience and worth everything.

name: Nicole Young
text: I started going to Dr. Johannson in May of this year. He and his Nursing staff are awesome. I had a hysterectomy in July he sent me to another excellent Dr. Oncologist/Gynecologic (Shah) in Birmingham. Found what may have appeared to be cancer. Without these two I wouldn't be posting this review! Life savers! Dr. Johannson and the Nurses at Cheaha really do make me feel like your family not a number. Not just another patient or rushed! They care and it shows! I'm up at almost 2 am lol. But Thank You Guy's ✊🙌🙌🙏🙏🙏😂

name: Maria Fair
text: Unfortunately I haven't met the doctor. He is really busy. The staff was kind and helpful and the nurse practitioner was ok; however I came to see the doctor.

name: Malorie Otwell
text: There's no better doctor anywhere! You can be assured that you will be taken care of by Dr. J and his staff. Wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: brittany spears
text: I love this drs office everyone is friendly and they love the kids too.

name: De Shay Waire
text: Wonderful doctor, as well as staff. They give you a warm welcome and make you feel safe and right at home.

name: April Camp
text: I really love them at Dr. Johannson's. I have been to many different gyno's in my life. This one by far is my favorite. They actually listen to what you are saying and really do understand women's issues. They also make you feel really comfortable when talking to them about what is going on. I defiantly plan on staying one of there patients.

name: Brooke Leonard
text: Kind staff, quick response times over the phone, short wait time even with an intake appointment, beautiful office, calming music, and wonderful doctor that knows what he is talking about. Couldn’t ask for better.

name: Katie Lambert
text: Love Dr. J!

resp.text: Love you back!

name: Randall Aldridge
text:
I was treated kindly, and felt welcome
I think I have seen DrJohanssen on Fame as a young dancer. I hope we can work together for a long time.

name: Kim Trantham
text: Everyone there is Awesome & kind.I believe I found him for a reason.He's the Best.God Bless them ALL...

name: Haley Battles
text:
Cheaha Womens Health and Wellness is by far the best OBGYN I have ever been to. No matter what I call about they are always caring and make me feel like I really matter. I've always felt comfortable with everybody that works there. I love coming in for an appointment knowing they know who I am.
I feel like everybody in the office is my family and they are all a great part of my journey with my pregnancies.

name: Rachel Webb
text:
Dr. Johannses dismissed my concerns and minimized my health issues. He made me feel ridiculous and charged me $250 for nothing. He told me either incorrect information or things I already knew. He scoffed at my questions and played his "I'm the Doctor so I'm superior" card. He didn't even give me my due date. He told me to stay on my antidepressants during my pregnancy and offered no other methods of managing my anxiety. Two other doctors have told me that under no circumstances should I take my antidepressants during the first trimester.
Do not go to this man. I want my money back.

name: CIARA LAWSON
text: Dr.Johannson was very professional and knowledgeable! The staff members were very polite as well!

name: Jennie Price
text: Awesome doctor, wonderful staff..  very welcoming, Dr. Johannson is very encouraging. He saved me and my baby. Those 30 mins I was suppose to take for NST turned into a weekend stay and a beautiful baby on a beautiful Sunday morning.. I love Cheaha Women’s Health and I would recommend them to anyone..

name: Tequell Duff
text: I really felt blessed to  receive care by this awesome group. God bless!!!!

name: Amber Godin
text: Amazing Doctor and staff! Always worth the travel for quality prenatal care!

name: Kayla Michelle
text: HE is amazing ! He cares for his patients and takes time to listen to everything they say! He does everything he can to help!:) I’m so glad I found him!!

name: Hannah Marie
text: Wonderful doctor, never in a hurry/always listens to any concerns and is so kind.😊

name: Olivia Bruce
text: Dr Johannson is the best and he's very good and understanding, plus he made me feel very at ease and He's so funny also. ALL the nurses are very sweet and nice.

name: Rachael Needham
text: Hands down the best OB-GYN in North Alabama. I drive from Huntsville to his office in Anniston, which is a 2 hour drive because I know he is supportive of natural labor and a patient Doctor. I also know that C-section rates are higher than should be  among Huntsville OBs. C-sections are great when needed, but not good for perfectly healthy women, like myself. I've had 2 completely natural births with him, and was able to labor in a birthing pool, and had the birth experience I dreamed about. I walked away from each birth experience feeling empowered and grateful . Not to mention, I have 2 beautifully healthy babes. Also, his bedside manor is the best. He speaks with you as if you are a friend, and does not talk down to you as if you are on a lower level. If you're wondering if Dr J is worth the drive...the answer is yes!

name: Lia Hopper
text: I did a lot of research before choosing Dr. J as my OBGYN. He delivered my 6th baby. None of my other birthing experiences even came close to how great this one was! He followed my birth plan exactly. I highly recommend him to any woman seeking an OBGYN and especially to women who want as natural a birthing experience as possible.

name: Jennifer James
text: The staff was very friendly.  I liked that I could fill outnmost of the forms online prior to my appointment .

name: Unique Porter
text: Dr. Johannson and his staff are amazing , very family oriented.

name: Sabrina Cloth
text: If I could leave a zero I would but I can’t - I can say it .here it is noon I’ve been here since 9:45am and haven’t been seen yet . They don’t give a damn about you or your health !

resp.text: Sorry to hear that. The difficult part of delivering babies is that they can't be scheduled. Sorry about your wait.

name: Mary Montgomery
text: Through, on time, professional and would certainly recommend.

name: Emily Calderon
text: Found him late in my pregnancy but even with my first time seeing him, I know this is where I will stay!

name: Hannah Ellis
text: Kind, patient doctor who offers lots of specialized support surrounding VBAC and natural birth.   Dr. Johannson is an Alabama treasure.

name: Shonda Derusha
text: Dr Johannson & his staff was very professional and friendly!!!!

name: charles howard
text: Dr. Raiford was fantastic! We were new to the area and I was very nervous about finding a doctor that would listen to our concerns. I had an abruption with my first and was concerned about the second. She took no chances with our little one. And made sure we had a great delivery with an early scheduled c-section. I highly recommend her!

name: Kaylen Shoupe
text: We cannot thank Dr. Perkins enough for getting our little boy here safely. She worked relentlessly through my pregnancy while I faced 32 weeks of sickness, hospital stays, an early delivery, and postpartum issues. I never lost confidence that she had our care as her top priority. Calling to check in or just having us stop by during changes in my treatment was not an inconvenience but her norm. We are eternally grateful that she treated our family so well. Her wealth of knowledge and calm demeanor were everything we needed. We ❤️ Dr. Perkins and the staff at Tennessee Valley OBGYN!

name: Shelby Sasser
text: I do not recommend Dr. Raiford. My prenatal care was okay. Any concerns or questions I had were brushed off. Dr. Raiford pressured me into an unnecessary C-Section. All of my nurses told me that if I would have had a different Dr my birth would not have ended in a C-Section because baby and I were doing fine. I lost all trust in her the moment she broke my water without warning and told me I was being emotional while laboring. It was a very traumatic experience.

name: Karen Zecher
text: Had my first visit with Dr. Perkins today. She and her staff were very welcoming and sincere as they took my history. Dr. P. is very easy to talk to and seems like she works with her patients to establish a plan of care. I’m thankful that friends recommended her practice to me!

name: Hannah Barney
text:
They tried to gaslight me by telling me the pain was all in my head. Im almost 30. I know what pain feels like lmao. Why would I pay money to be gaslit by a "medical professional"

Never got the results from my PAP.

I had an IUD for a little over four years, the last year it had been causing me severe, sharp pains. I asked for it to be removed because of the pain. The nurse said it was impossible for the IUD to cause me pain so it must be something else. But I could have my IUD removed since it was almost at five years. She made it very clear that they would not remove my IUD if it wasn't close to being due for removal. When they removed my IUD they got angry that I refused another. The pain went away when the IUD was taken out. At a followup appointment I said I was no longer dealing with pain since the IUD was removed, and I was told that it was impossible for an IUD to cause pain, so I must have imagined the pain. So if I had been in my first year of the IUD they would have refused to remove it, and let me suffer. Also, I was never able to get my PAP results. I wouldn't be surprised if they lost it.
So no thanks, I like to spend my money on a doctor who takes their patients seriously and provides medical care when needed.
The Huntsville womens health clinic is much more organized and professional.

name: Awakening Enthusiast
text:
If you are a doordash delivery person I highly recommend not delivering food to this business. 10+ miles plus parking super far and having to walk it up to the 2nd floor suite 200 they order $50+ orders and do not ever tip the drivers. Two times was enough for me. We don't work for free. Leanne is a very cheap person to just expect us to bring it to her. Especially when it's several bags of food and you have to carry it that far that's ridiculous.

Sincerely

Michael A.

name: Hannah Garnett
text: Very kind staff. Efficient. I saw Morgan, CRNP and she was great!

name: Gracie James
text: My experience with nurses and staff at TN Valley Obgyn are always nice enough, but every single time im there, without fail, i wait in the waiting room AT LEAST an hour after my appointment time. its just inconsiderate of my time. not to mention the waiting room was burning up, at least 80°f. its just upsetting making an appointment at 2:15 and not leaving until 4 pm, after a 5 minute procedure.

name: Cassidy Roberts
text: I love Tennessee Valley OBGYN! They are fantastic! I have gone here for years. Doctor Perkins and her staff are the best. Doctor Perkins is so personable and she makes sure to sit down and answer any of my questions and listen to my concerns. I am so thankful to be so well taken care of during my first pregnancy. I 100% recommend TV OBGYN & Doctor Perkins! I plan to continue to see Doctor Perkins for all of my pregnancies.

name: Shakia Crumbie
text: I absolutely LOVE Dr. Perkins and Tennessee Valley OBGYN! The staff is amazingly polite from the beginning to the end! I felt heard by Dr. Perkins and she not only listened but came up with a game plan to begin to correct my health issues! I would recommend her office to anyone in need of an outstanding OBGYN!!!! If I could give 10 stars, I would!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Stephanie Cross
text: Dr.Raiford and her team are the best. They make you feel like family and not just another patient. They take the time to sit down and listen to you and what may be going on, then they come up with the best solution for you. They are just truly a welcoming team.

name: Alexis Randles
text: Dr. Raiford & Dr. LeAnn are the most amazing doctors in my opinion! Dr. LeAnn is so comforting, she makes sure she answers any and all questions that I have and she takes extra time with me. Dr. Raiford is so compassionate and very helpful, and encouraging. Both doctors are so sweet and caring!

name: sara lenahan
text: I went while i was in college at21 yo. I have had problems with bleeding, irregularity, and pain since i first started menstruating as a preteen. I went here with a family history of PCOS and endometriosis and had all the signs and symptoms. They immediately dismissed me and said that’s just how it is and made me get a blood test and std test (i told them I’m monogamous and have only been with 2 serious boyfriends at the time) and the nurse practitioner said “well at your age and being in college and in a sorority(she read my tshirt)  it’s probably an STD because stds can cause abnormal bleeding”after that i haven’t been back since. My tests came back clean and they didn’t bother to look further. I wish i was making this up.  I am not releasing names publicly  because maybe the CNP  didn’t like me but be prepared for judgement if you’re young

name: Wren Miller
text: The expert wisdom, deep compassion, and efficient logistics are just a few of the reasons I appreciate TN Valley OBGYN. I had been on a ten year journey trying to find out the cause of significant but disparate symptoms but after only one visit Dr Raiford had identified the potential problem and sent me for some basic labs that no other doc had considered. Within two weeks I was on my way to a new level of health that I hadn’t known in over a decade and now we have two beautiful children from the thoughtful consideration and real time forward thinking care of Dr Raiford and the whole team at TN Valley OBGYN. No place is perfect but this one is as close to it as I have ever experienced.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your kind words. We appreciate you taking the time to share your great experience. The team here at Tennessee Valley OBGYN is delighted to hear your feedback, and we're proud to be trusted with the healthcare of the women of Huntsville and North Alabama.

name: Phyills White
text: Yes I’m very pleased with the top- notch service I received. DR.Perkins staff was very friendly, and professional..I would recommend DR. Perkins to any female who’s looking for a new OB-GYN doctor. Thank you so much for the news I received.Sincerely P.White

name: Jen Slack
text: Dr. Perkins helped me fight through insurance issues regarding an expensive proscription, she knows what she’s doing, and she has excellent bedside manner. Love her. Would recommend her to anyone!

name: Melissa Quinones-Dennee
text:
So far the wait time hasn’t been terrible, but as expected, it’s at least 30 minutes each time. The biggest issue I have with this practice is the ability to get ahold of anyone!

I had an urgent need a little before 6am one morning, and all I got was an answering machine. I had to call Women4Women to get the operator to patch me through to Tennessee Valley’s on call nurse. When it comes to scheduling appointments, it rings a few times then asks you to press 1 to continue holding or 2 to leave a message... I will be on hold for 10 minutes and finally just decide to leave a voicemail. If I’m not able to answer the moment they call (which is often since I also have a toddler at home and don’t live by my phone), then I’m stuck having to email them in order to make appointments or make changes to an existing one. I actually had to cancel an appointment by email because I couldn’t get through by phone. Terrible phone system!! Sadly, that really impacts the service to patients.

So far, good experience with the techs, nurses, and Dr. Callison. They seem to have a very knowledgeable and caring team. That has outweighed the difficulty of getting ahold of the office staff.

UPDATE: Left this practice for Women4Women and was personally much happier there.

name: Shaniqua Walton
text: I have been going to Dr. Raiford for over 13 years and I couldn’t see myself nowhere else. Dr. Raiford and her staff are the best in business. I don’t feel like just a patient, they make me feel like family.

name: Casie Slate
text: Dr. Raiford was awesome! I was very nervous about this first visit because I had gotten so used to my previous OB/GYN, who is now retired. Dr. Raiford made me feel so comfortable and at ease that I forgot all about even being nervous after she walked in. She is a very professional, witty, and knowledgeable doctor. So glad I chose her as my new GYN!!

name: JulieAnnShultz
text: Dr. Raiford is so caring and really listens to her patients concerns. She helped me through two high risk pregnancies and I am so thankful for her and her staff!

name: Devin Chivers
text: I love Dr. Raiford and LeeAnne! The staff is amazing and they make you feel really comfortable!

name: Ginger Young
text: I am forever grateful to Dr Raiford and her staff. I thank her for her thorough exam, pre-op testing, surgical skills, and experience.

name: Cassidy Bates
text: Very poor experiences here. I have major trouble getting anyone on the phone, when someone finally answered I was placed on hold for 10-20 minutes until I just hang up. This has happened now 3x in a row. Appointments always run behind so be prepared to wait 30-45 minutes in the waiting room at least! Very impersonal staff and doctors. After 6 years of going here, I finally left & I am so glad I did. I am now actually being heard & I feel more comfortable! Highly recommend OBGYN Associates in Madison/Decatur in your looking for a new place!

name: Clarissa Fredrickson
text: Dr. Callison is amazing! Calming and funny bedside manner that puts you at ease and she really cares about her patients. Highly recommend. In reference to wait times, I found scheduling first thing in the morning made wait times very short.

name: Ashley Mires
text: Dr. Raiford and her staff are amazing!

name: Katherine Robbins
text: This practice is amazing! I see Dr. Callison and she is my favorite doctor I have ever had. She is kind, caring, thorough, hilarious, and super intelligent! She always lets me ask any questions I have and answers them completely, I never feel like I am being rushed. The wait time in the waiting room can be long sometimes, but to me it’s worth it! Dr. Callison delivered my son (who is two now) and it was the best experience, I feel completely safe and taken care of in her hands. I am now half way through my 2nd pregnancy and still nothing but wonderful experiences!

name: Catherine Roberts
text: So thankful for the care I receive at TN Valley OBGYN. Dr. Raiford and all of the nurses and staff are fantastic. Every care or concern I have is always taken care of in a timely and caring manner. I would absolutely recommend Dr. Raiford and her practice to anyone looking for OBGYN care.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for sharing. The team here at Tennessee Valley OBGYN is delighted to hear your feedback.

name: Brittany Alexander
text: I always have a good experience here. The entire office staff is pleasant and helpful from the front desk throughout the entire visit. My husband and I always feel like we receive the absolute BEST  care during our prenatal/postnatal visits, and I always feel heard and cared for during my Gyn visits. Dr. Raiford has the best bedside manner, and I trust very word that she says because of her knowledge. I know that no matter what my circumstance (and I have had some unique ones) that I will be listened to, respected, informed, and will leave the office knowing what I need to know. Totally would recommend this office and especially Dr. Raiford and her team to any woman in any stage of life. They excel in patient care and service.

name: The Fussy Fox
text: I have seen Dr. Karen Raiford, Nurse Practitioner Leanne Sparks, and Nurse Practitioner Amanda Harris, and all were absolutely wonderful. I always feel comfortable and respected by them and their staff, and they made sure that I fully understood anything we discussed and the options we were weighing.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your kind words. We appreciate you taking the time to share your great experience. We pride ourselves on excellent patient care and education and we're delighted to hear your feedback!

name: L H
text: I am disappointed in this practice. I have been requesting records for over a month In order to transition to another practice, and even though I have filled out the required records request form and called numerous times asking nicely for them and stating I am ready to pay the amount required,  I cannot get my records. I have now called several times. Someone called me three weeks ago and said she would call me back 2 weeks ago when they are ready but this still has not happened.

name: Gabirelle Sperry
text: Dr. Cardwell Is truly an incredible doctor she took such great care of me for nine months with me and my baby boy. she was efficient, informative and kind and treated me more like a friend than any other doctor I have had .she always answered my questions and made me feel safe about my labor and my cesarean and l cannot wait to go back to her again and would recommend her to anyone.

name: Piper King
text: Dr. Raiford is awesome! She is an amazing surgeon. I would highly recommend her for prolapse surgery!!!

name: Keasha Bellomy
text: We love Dr. Raiford and her staff. Would not consider going anywhere else.

name: April Phillips
text: I saw Dr.Perkins today for the first time and I’m very happy with the care I received. My gynecologist retired and I was nervous about finding a new doctor. I’m so glad I chose her. She really took her time and answered all of my questions. She was so nice and down to earth and made me feel at ease. Her staff was great too, everyone was very nice and professional.

name: Melissa
text: I have a medical EMERGENCY 🚨 and called the office FIRST thing this morning needing to come in and see my OBGYN. Obviously not wanting to go to the hospital (due to covid). The receptionist said she’ll make a note for the nurse and mark it as “URGENT” (her words). I called them 3 times today wondering why the nurse never called me. It is now 2:30 pm and the office is CLOSED and unable to get in to see my doctor who I “NEEDED” to see and I now have to go the whole entire weekend in pelvic PAIN because they have NO SENSE of URGENCY!! I’m so beyond mad right now I can’t!!!!! Thanks for caring so much about your patients (she says sarcastically)!!!!

name: Tish Gray
text: They take the time to listen. Nothing but kindness as soon as you walk in the door. The entire staff is professional and kind.

name: Lara Dunlap
text: Can't get anyone to answer phone. Have left multiple messages. It's been a week and my rx is still not called in.

name: Amber Falls
text: I'm new to the area and Dr. Callison was recommended to me. I had a great experience and would definitely recommend her to others. She was pleasant, friendly, educative and spent time talking with me. I loved the nurse, Stacey, as well. They made me feel comfortable and were very helpful with any questions I had.

name: Karlee Stenger
text: I have been going to TVOBGYN for a few years seeing Dr. Cardwell and I love her! I’m not a very decisive person and she always takes the time to explain everything. She is very sweet and caring and took such great care of me during my pregnancy! Only down fall I have ever had is the wait times can be pretty long but I have always been given an apology every time they are late and to me that shows me that if they are taking time for their other patients they are going to take that time for me as well. Forever grateful to this office for making my pregnancy so easy with my little one!

name: K H
text:
Dr. Callison is a fantastic doctor!  The admin/scheduling staff is an entirely different story  and only continue to get worse.  I’ve been going to this practice for several years now and truly the only reason I’ve stayed is because of the doctor.  I cannot recall a time that I have not waited a minimum of at least 45+ minutes (and this is on a good day with an 8 AM appointment).

Recently I had an appointment scheduled. The office sent a text message the day prior to confirm the appointment.  The following day, I arrived to a sign on the door saying they were closed due to weather.  That is completely fine (safety first).  HOWEVER, at the point you decide to close the office, contact your client(s) to let them know.  I drove over an hour to be at the appointment. If they have the capability to text and confirm the appointment then they have the capability to text and cancel it.... they show absolutely no care or consideration for anyone.

name: Charlotte Ashley Graham
text: Dr Callison is my favorite ever! She is an amazing OB who is caring, smart, and takes her patients' care very seriously. I loved having her deliver my baby and would trust her with my life.

name: Tara L
text: I am patient of Dr Cardwell. She was very through and informative and tried to help me get the answers I do desperately needed. She and her staff advocated to get me the medicine I needed, they were quick to call in any medications, and quick to get me in for an ultrasound to check on my growing Bebe. My only negative view was the wait time for my latest appointment, it was over 45 minute wait for the ultrasound then another 30 minute wait to see her. Other than the long waiting’s, she as a doctor was great!

name: Samantha Wallace
text: Dr. Warren is amazing! Best doctor I have ever had and I won't use anybody else since I have found her. She was so nice when we had our miscarriage and did not rush us and even took time to explain everything where we could understand. She really goes above and beyond for her patients. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND DR.WARREN!!

name: Isaiah Morris
text: Welcome to the place that has zero idea on how to manage time. Prepare to wait forever to be seen. Great doctors and nurses but absolutely horrendous waiting times. Prepare to waste an entire half day ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS

name: eli
text: Unacceptable service. Blew my mind how incredibly awful it was. They treated me like i was a monkey. DESGUSTANG!!! SICKENING!!!!

name: April Hyatt
text: I went to Dr. Kakani at Tennesse Valley OB GYN for 10 years before she left and opened her own office so, why would I not want to transfer my files to her? I mean, after all, she was the only doctor in that practice that I saw for a decade. Needless to say, my first appointment with Dr. Kakani at her new office didn't go so well. I never got to see her and her Nurse Practioner was very rude to me to the point that I didn't even want her to touch me. To make a long story short, I contacted TVOBGYN to see if there was a doctor there that I could see. They proceeded to tell me that since I transferred out of their practice, that none of the doctors there would ever see me again! What?!?! I never saw anyone there but Dr. Kakani in the first place. That is just pure craziness to me!

name: Lynda Hoagland
text: My life long OB/Gyn recently retired forcing me to make a change. Dr. Callison impressed me with the educational time she took when my daughter saw her (full color 8X10 glossies of venereal diseases) as well as her easy, calm, caring manner. I decided I would see if Dr. Callison was accepting patients for Gyn only. Today I saw Meghan Flinn, PA-C who was really delightful! She was kind, thorough and efficient.  She discussed my concerns with me and gave some good advice related to my mammograms. I believe I made a good choice calling Tennessee Valley OB GYN!

name: Sidney Masters-Cooper
text: I don’t know how they are as a whole, but when I went at 17 Dr. Cardwell treated me as a joke. If she doesn’t agree with your views, or your wishes she will not treat you with respect. On a side-note I told them I thought my iron levels were low and requested blood work. They told me my levels were slightly low and just to take an iron vitamin. Years later I’ve found out I’m anemic now.

name: Bri Bailey
text:
One time the front desk scheduled me for one time and when i arrived they said it was scheduled for a different time. The next visit I scheduled, I called 2 days before my apt. to update my insurance and she told me I wasn't on the schedule at all and I didnt have an apt.
When I am actually scheduled for an apt the front staff greets you with gloomy faces and acts as if it's a burden that you've arrived. You have to drive around at least 10 min. In circles to find parking. Once you get to the back it's much better!!! Kirsten and Dr. Raiford are a great duo they are the best! The ultrasound lady that drives from Cullman was very polite and personable also- definitely eases the akwardness from a transvaginal ultrasound by a thousand.

name: Jorden Warr
text: I can’t brag on this group of people enough! Dr. Callison, Meghan, Caitlyn, and the entire staff are wonderful.

name: Katie Mucci
text: Dr Callison is amazing! She is so thorough and caring.

name: Julie Kochie
text: Dr. Raiford is great, but be prepare to wait A LONG time in the waiting room.  If you are a non-pregnant working woman, chances are you'll be waiting the longest.  You might as well take at least a half a day off work for just a simple checkup appointment.

name: Elizabeth Henson
text: Dr. Raiford and her staff are efficient and very professional. I have never waited more than a few minutes past my appointment time and am usually taken back early.  I switched to Dr. Raiford after a bad surgery experience elsewhere which needed to be repeated. She was amazing. My hospital stay and recovery were entirely polar opposite experiences from before. I would recommend her as a surgeon without hesitation!

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: I am only halfway through my pregnancy and Dr. Raiford is my doctor.  She and her nurses are amazing!!  Every time I call with a question or concern they are more than helpful and concerned and I never feel like my questions are dumb.  They answer in a very quick amount of time and Raiford is a wonderful, caring and fun doctor!

name: Shayla Brewer
text: Dr.Callison makes you feel very comfortable and I am so happy I’ve chosen her as my Obgyn!

name: Kristy Compton
text: Dr Callison and her nurses are amazing!! My 2 daughters and I all go to her for treatment. She has an unbelievable bedside manner. I recommend her to everyone I know!

name: Martha DeFrank
text: The office is often over scheduled, leading to hour long wait times. There isn't enough parking to give to the amount of people that go here. The staff of the doctors are nice and professional, in spite of the over scheduling. Wouldn't choose to come back.

name: Cassidy
text:
They don't care about you unless you're pregnant.

And one the first things you should not is they don't do Facebook reviews and they do post approval. I've posted several times about the poor care I've received and those posts don't make it public.

If you want an office that will pressure you into life changing surgery when you are young, healthy, and free of other medical problems, this is the place for you!

Especially if you'd like for them to make that recommendation based on damaged pathology results (that's AFTER pushing you towards a procedure with longer recovery to retrieve the sample - as to not damage it) AND not tell you that the sample is fractured. Did I mention they don't provide you with copies of your pathology?

Oh, and don't try and call and get your pathology transferred to another office for a second opinion.  They'll tell you your records aren't yours, you have no right to them, etc. When you push and get them sent they will unceremoniously drop you as a patient, but without cancelling your appointment and surgery that are on the books. Even after calling and cancelling myself, they've made no move to reverse the money I'd already paid towards the surgery.

They ended up transferring my records without confirming my identity. I had called and left a message, and called back again within the hour. I didn't identify myself, but they assumed I was the person from the message and sent off the records without my name, date of birth, or any confirmation of my identity. I guess it's lucky I am who I say I am.

Bottom line, they have too many patients and the ones not popping out babies don't equal enough money. They are aggressive and pushy with treatments and lack bedside manner and empathy and compassion. My heart isn't broken at all about leaving this practice. I'd cancelled the surgery before I got the passive aggressive letter letting me know I'd be dropped as a patient.

If you choose this practice, good luck. Good luck with lying, misleading, rudeness, poor organization, general blase attitude toward HIPAA laws, and two to three hour wait times.

I'm finally freeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee, well, at least I will be when I get this money back.

name: Katelyn Capley
text: Definitely not enough parking, Dr Raiford is very nice but does not seem to give enough time in her visits.

text: Dr. Ashford delivered all three of my children and I’ve been going to him for years. Since 2009. However, the last few times I’ve been have not been the same. Extra staff has been added.  The front desk still the same , but the nurses, cnas that call you in the back are not friendly ,  vibe and attitude not right for a doctor’s office.   Today , like the last two times ; I waited an hour and a half to go in the back. The CNA that called me back..... eyes rolling like she had a problem and didn’t want to be there.   The back is too crowded, and unprofessional. Nurses everywhere but still slow. Really don’t feel like a doctors office at all. Not going back , changing my doctor. I rather go to the health department.

name: Meshia
text:
If I could have done this review without giving any stars, I would have. But, this star is for LaTory Franks. She really deserves all 5, but this review is not about her. Dr. Ashford has been my gynecologist for more than 10 years, so needless to say, I trusted him. He performed a surgery on me that in turned almost took my life, because he continued to diagnose me inaccurately from the pain I was having after the surgery. I ended up with sepsis, diverticulitis, and an ostomy bag. I have never had any marks on my body, not even my stomach, but after Dr. Ashford's surgery, my stomach looks like a train track with connect the dots around it. This sent me into a depressed state. I have to see this every day when I look at myself.
After which he had no remorse or concern for. He was always nice until he did something wrong. He acts as if he is some type of god with people lives in his hand. But, everyone has to answer to THE MOST HIGH GOD!! I would definitely not refer my worst enemy, let along family, friends, or associates to him or cahaba medical. Even after I did my grievance report concerning this issue, and was notified that his attorneys told him to contact me, to this day, nothing has been done, and, no one from cahaba medical has contacted me since, because they don't care either.
